title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 13 - new beta build available
description:
In this video we will look at what has been added and what has been fixed in the second beta release for Sim Update 13 which will be released in a few weeks. The list is not very long but a good thing to see is that the white dot issue is now resolved. Besides this the glass cockpit and some aircrafts received some bug fixes.
